chapters.title: Chapter 32: A Yellow Flower-Spider
chapters.info: Lord Gokhan, p. 552—Seanchan noble, of the Low Blood. Min has a viewing of him: white lace trailing in a pond, indicating he will marry in the near future. Upon hearing this, Fortuona orders him removed from the front lines so he will not be killed, but forbids him to marry until the end of Tarmon Gai'don. Min refrains herself from objecting that it does not work that way.
